meanings.definition: The overhanging lower edge of a roof.
meanings.sent1: Rain dripped from the eaves during the storm.
meanings.sent2: The birds built their nests under the protective eaves of the house.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid acorns along the eaves, thinking they were safe.
meanings.sent4: The eaves shielded the window from the harsh sunlight like a loyal guardian.
meanings.sent5: I always feel cozy sitting by the fireplace under the eaves on a rainy day.

meanings.definition: The lower edge of a roof that meets or overhangs the walls of a building.
meanings.sent1: The snow piled up along the eaves, creating a picturesque scene.
meanings.sent2: The icicles hanging from the eaves sparkled in the winter sun.
meanings.sent3: The cat enjoyed watching the world go by from the eaves, feeling like a king.
meanings.sent4: The eaves of the old barn whispered stories of bygone days in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The eaves provided a perfect vantage point to observe the bustling street below.
